timeline.message: Add config to control whether ownerEmail is mandatory or not
Add config to control whether ownerEmail is mandatory or not

timeline.body:
Hi, @skissane.

Nice PR. Thanks for working on it.

I would just rename this for ```OwnerEmailMandatory```. We already know that this is a Constraint because of the word ```mandatory```. What do you think?

replies.bodyText: Well, if you look at the other annotations in com.netflix.conductor.common.constraints package, they've all got Constraint at the end of their name as well. So, even though I agree the word is a bit superfluous, it is consistent with the others.
